name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HTML Editor for Gmail by cloudHQ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: HTML Editor for Gmail™ - code HTML email directly from Gmail
short.de: Kostenloser HTML-Editor für Gmail™ - Codieren Sie HTML-E-Mails direkt aus Gmail
short.es: Editor HTML gratuito para Gmail™: codifique el correo electrónico HTML directamente desde Gmail
short.fr: Éditeur HTML gratuit pour Gmail™ - codez les e-mails HTML directement depuis Gmail
short.it: Editor HTML gratuito per Gmail™ - codifica email HTML direttamente da Gmail
short.ja: Gmail™用の無料のHTMLエディター-Gmailから直接HTMLメールをコーディングする
short.nl: Gratis HTML-editor voor Gmail™ - codeer HTML-e-mail rechtstreeks vanuit Gmail
short.pl: Darmowy edytor HTML dla Gmail™ — kod HTML wiadomości e-mail bezpośrednio z Gmaila
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Editor de HTML gratuito para Gmail™ - codifique e-mails em HTML diretamente do Gmail
short.zh_CN: Gmail™ 的免费 HTML 编辑器 - 直接从 Gmail 编码 HTML 电子邮件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Do you have HTML skills? 

Do wish you could customize Gmail emails to include things like:

✓ Tables
✓ Charts
✓ Call-to-action buttons
✓ Side by side images (great for social media logos!)

If you answered yes to any of the above, do we ever have a treat for you!

This email HTML editor is a top-of-the-line, split screen HTML editor that lets you customize Gmail email to include anything that your creativity can think of.

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

App website: https://www.html-editor-for-gmail.com/
cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net
Pricing: https://www.html-editor-for-gmail.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail_html
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net

Gmail, Google Calendar, and  Google Workspace are trademarks of Google LLC. Use of these trademarks is subject to Google Permissions.
